item.title: JSON formatting in VIM
item.description: Quick read To format JSON in vim follow the following steps Install gojson In vim open JSON file and after clicking esc type :%!gojson to format the current buffer. To save the buffer type :w as usual How it works A little Introduction Everybody knows how pipes work at the command prompt. Text originates from some source, is processed via one or more tools that accepts input through standard input each pass its output through pipes
